title: [grib-api@1.24.0] 14 self-test cases fail to be executed.
body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->
I meet a problem about Grib-api Self-Test Failure
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
[root@centos8 spack-src]#ls
AUTHORS         INSTALL      NEWS           acinclude.m4    bin     config.log     data         grib_api-import.cmake.in  ifs_samples  make_dist_definitions  python   src    tox.ini
CMakeLists.txt  LICENSE      NOTICE         aclocal.m4      build   config.status  definitions  grib_api.sublime-project  libtool      perf                   rpms     tests  version.sh
COPYING         Makefile.am  README         autogen.sh      cmake   configure      examples     grib_api_config.h.in      license.pl   perl                   samples  tigge  windows
ChangeLog       Makefile.in  VERSION.cmake  autom4te.cache  config  configure.ac   fortran      html                      m4           project_summary.cmake  share    tools
[root@centos8 spack-src]#mkdir  build
[root@centos8 spack-src]#cd build
[root@centos8 build]#cmake ..
[root@centos8 build]#make
[root@centos8 build]#ctest
……
83/99 Test #81: grib_api_f_read_from_file ........   Passed    0.01 sec
      Start 82: grib_api_f_get_set_uuid
84/99 Test #82: grib_api_f_get_set_uuid ..........   Passed    0.06 sec
      Start 83: grib_api_f_clone
85/99 Test #83: grib_api_f_clone .................   Passed    0.04 sec
      Start 84: grib_api_p_clone_test
86/99 Test #84: grib_api_p_clone_test ............***Failed    0.16 sec
      Start 85: grib_api_p_count_messages_test
87/99 Test #85: grib_api_p_count_messages_test ...***Failed    0.15 sec
      Start 86: grib_api_p_get_test
88/99 Test #86: grib_api_p_get_test ..............***Failed    0.20 sec
      Start 87: grib_api_p_index_test
89/99 Test #87: grib_api_p_index_test ............***Failed    0.15 sec
      Start 88: grib_api_p_iterator_test
90/99 Test #88: grib_api_p_iterator_test .........***Failed    0.18 sec
      Start 89: grib_api_p_keys_iterator_test
91/99 Test #89: grib_api_p_keys_iterator_test ....***Failed    0.15 sec
      Start 90: grib_api_p_multi_write_test
92/99 Test #90: grib_api_p_multi_write_test ......***Failed    0.18 sec
      Start 91: grib_api_p_nearest_test
93/99 Test #91: grib_api_p_nearest_test ..........***Failed    0.15 sec
      Start 92: grib_api_p_print_data_test
94/99 Test #92: grib_api_p_print_data_test .......***Failed    0.18 sec
      Start 93: grib_api_p_samples_test
95/99 Test #93: grib_api_p_samples_test ..........***Failed    0.15 sec
      Start 94: grib_api_p_set_test
96/99 Test #94: grib_api_p_set_test ..............***Failed    0.18 sec
      Start 95: grib_api_p_set_missing_test
97/99 Test #95: grib_api_p_set_missing_test ......***Failed    0.15 sec
      Start 96: grib_api_p_binary_message_test
98/99 Test #96: grib_api_p_binary_message_test ...***Failed    0.18 sec
      Start 97: grib_api_p_set_bitmap_test
99/99 Test #97: grib_api_p_set_bitmap_test .......***Failed    0.15 sec

86% tests passed, 14 tests failed out of 99

Label Time Summary:
download_data    = 1272.01 sec*proc (2 tests)
executable       =   0.02 sec*proc (1 test)
grib_api         = 1442.37 sec*proc (99 tests)
script           = 170.34 sec*proc (96 tests)

Total Test time (real) = 1442.43 sec

The following tests FAILED:
         84 - grib_api_p_clone_test (Failed)
         85 - grib_api_p_count_messages_test (Failed)
         86 - grib_api_p_get_test (Failed)
         87 - grib_api_p_index_test (Failed)
         88 - grib_api_p_iterator_test (Failed)
         89 - grib_api_p_keys_iterator_test (Failed)
         90 - grib_api_p_multi_write_test (Failed)
         91 - grib_api_p_nearest_test (Failed)
         92 - grib_api_p_print_data_test (Failed)
         93 - grib_api_p_samples_test (Failed)
         94 - grib_api_p_set_test (Failed)
         95 - grib_api_p_set_missing_test (Failed)
         96 - grib_api_p_binary_message_test (Failed)
         97 - grib_api_p_set_bitmap_test (Failed)
Errors while running CTest
```
This version is outdated. Currently, https://software.ecmwf.int/wiki/display/GRIB/Home in the grib-api community has not been released. Four years ago, Replacing **GRIB API** with **ecCodes** is expected to be transparent for current GRIB API users was described. In fact, the ECCodes version is found when you open https://software.ecmwf.int/wiki/display/GRIB/Releases. The **official document** states that all the data processing functions of the grib are submitted to ecCodes for improvement.I'd like to ask if the grib-api is not in maintenance and has been abandoned and moved to ecCodes?

### Information on your system
[root@centos8 spack-src]# spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-1623-8d3272f82d
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-aarch64
* **Concretizer:** original
<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

- [ ] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
